meanings.definition: The ability to perform multiple tasks simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: Her multitaskings impressed everyone at the office.
meanings.sent2: Multitaskings is essential in today's fast-paced world.
meanings.sent3: She tried her multitaskings skills while juggling work and family.
meanings.sent4: His multitaskings were like a well-oiled machine, smoothly handling various tasks at once.
meanings.sent5: The art of multitaskings requires focus and organization.

meanings.definition: Engaging in more than one activity at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The multitaskings student completed homework while watching TV.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her multitaskings abilities in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The cat's multitaskings behavior of playing and napping simultaneously amused the family.
meanings.sent4: His multitaskings approach to life was like a busy bee, always buzzing with activity.
meanings.sent5: The multitaskings nature of the project required careful planning and coordination.
